author: Tamara Williamson
subject: question
body:
does anyone know how to re-subcribe to the lupin list outside of the site? The mailbox that i am using now will be shutting down by the end of the month and i would like to change addys. I tried to write the list owner but without luck so far, and majordomo will not let me subcribe at all.


But on a lighter note..did anyone get the Lupin Box set? I preordered mine on the last avalable day but wont find out if i got it for another 2 weeks. I havent recieved any phonecalls so it could be good.


Tam
